exposurecontrol: Programmed Auto with flexible Program (P) Shutter-Priority Auto (S) Aperture-Priority Auto (A) Manual (M) Scene Auto Selector
flashtype: i-TTL flash control using image sensor available
flashmode: Auto Auto with red-eye reduction Fill-flash Fill-flash with Slow sync Red-eye reduction Red-eye reduction with Slow sync Rear curtain sync Rear curtain with slow sync Slow sync with red-eye reduction Off
imagetype: Compliant with DCF (Design Rule for Camera File System) 2.0 DPOF (Digital Print Order Format) EXIF 2.3 (Exchangeable Image File Format for Digital Still Cameras) PictBridge
flashexposurecompensation: -3 to +1 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
aelock: Luminosity locked at detected value with AE-L/AF-L button
movierecording: HD: 1920 x 1080/60i HD: 1920 x 1080/30p HD: 1280 x 720/60p HD: 1280 x 720/30p Slow-motion: 640 x 240/400fps Slow-motion: 320 x 120/1200fps Motion Snapshot: 1,280 x 720/60p (plays at 24p) Audio file format: ACC Movie file format: MOV
focuslock: Focus can be locked by pressing shutter-release button halfway (single AF)
scenemodes: Portrait Landscape Night Landscape Night Portrait Close-up Auto
meteringsystem: Exposure Metering System: TTL metering using image sensor Metering Method: Matrix, Center-weighted: Meters 4.5mm circle in center of frame, Spot: Meters 2mm circle centered on select focus area
shootingmodes: Advanced movie mode (includes slow motion) Auto Photo mode Best Moment Capture mode (includes Slow View and Smart Photo Selector) Creative mode (including: P, S, A, M, Night Landscape, Night Portrait, Backlighting, Soft, Miniature Effect, and Selective Color) Motion Snapshot (16:9)
fileformat: Compressed 12-bit NEF (RAW) JPEG: JPEG-Baseline compliant with fine (approx 1:4), normal (approx 1:8), or basic (approx 1:16) compression
resolution: Still Images (3:2 aspect ratio): 3,872 x 2,592, 2,896 x 1,944, 1,936 x 1,296 Still images (aspect ratio 16:9): 3,840 x 2,160 (Motion Snapshot mode or 1,080/60i, 1,080/30p selected in advanced movie mode), 1,280 x 720 (720/60p, 720/30p selected in advanced movie mode)
focusingmodes: Auto (AF) Auto AF-S/AF-C selection (AF-A) Single-servo AF (AF-S) Continuous-servo (AF-C) Full-time Servo (AF-F) Manual Focus (MF)
